pages.text: $(l)$(thing)Cult's Temple$() - is an ancient structure that can be found inside jungles.$(br2)It was made by some strange cult that $(o)worshipped the five elements$().

pages.title: Finally, a quest!
pages.text: Legends say that you may find some 'instructions'(Materials to combine powerful amulets!) But beware of a lot of creepers!$(br2) That's all that is known about these temples.$(br2)$(l)Objective$(): Find it!$(br)$(l)Location$(): Jungles, y<=65
